results.name: default/mysql

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/mysql-7fb748d5bb-w5ksr], expected 1

Service default/mysql has event 0/3 nodes are available: 1 node(s) had untolerated taint {node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane: }, 2 node(s) had untolerated taint {node.kubernetes.io/not-ready: }. preemption: 0/3 nodes are available: 3 Preemption is not helpful for scheduling.
Service default/mysql has event Back-off restarting failed container mysql in pod mysql_default(17978c67-705b-4de5-b9c8-dff1fbb5fb28)

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints due to pod issues and node taints preventing scheduling.

Solution: 
1. Check pod logs for errors: `kubectl logs mysql-7fb748d5bb-w5ksr`.
2. Remove taints or add tolerations to nodes.
3. Ensure nodes are ready: `kubectl get nodes`.
4. Restart failed pod: `kubectl delete pod mysql-7fb748d5bb-w5ksr`.

results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-56bd4756b7-ww6lz], expected 1

Service default/wordpress has event 0/3 nodes are available: 1 node(s) had untolerated taint {node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane: }, 2 node(s) had untolerated taint {node.kubernetes.io/not-ready: }. preemption: 0/3 nodes are available: 3 Preemption is not helpful for scheduling.

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints due to pod scheduling issues caused by node taints.

Solution: 
1. Check node taints with `kubectl describe node`.
2. Add tolerations to pod spec for control-plane and not-ready taints.
3. Ensure nodes are ready and schedulable.

results.name: default/mysql

error.Text: the last termination reason is Error container=mysql pod=mysql

results.details:
Error: The MySQL container in the pod named 'mysql' terminated due to an error.

Solution: 
1. Check MySQL container logs for specific error details.
2. Verify MySQL configuration and credentials.
3. Ensure the MySQL image version is compatible.
4. Check resource limits and adjust if necessary.
5. Restart the pod.

results.name: default/mysql-7fb748d5bb-w5ksr

error.Text: the last termination reason is Error container=mysql pod=mysql-7fb748d5bb-w5ksr

results.details:
Error: The MySQL container in the pod 'mysql-7fb748d5bb-w5ksr' terminated with an error.

Solution: 
1. Check pod logs: `kubectl logs mysql-7fb748d5bb-w5ksr`.
2. Inspect events: `kubectl describe pod mysql-7fb748d5bb-w5ksr`.
3. Verify MySQL config and resources.
4. Restart pod: `kubectl delete pod mysql-7fb748d5bb-w5ksr`.

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
